pageContext.claim: “[The president of Mexico has] been terrific to us on the border because he stopped -- he stopped -- you don't see the caravans coming up anymore. You don't see all the problems. When I took office, it was unbelievable what was going on.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump constantly spins the numbers on apprehensions at the border. He used to brag about the number of arrests. Now that the coronavirus has all but ended border crossings, he claims arrests are a low point — or in this case, gives credit to the president of Mexico for stopping migrants.
